context_of_use: The urban mobility planner analyzes historical traffic situations and estimates the cost, emissions, and noise impacts of proposed measures.
stakeholders_and_interests: urban mobility planner: To validate urban mobility proposals and assess their impacts.
description: This use case allows the urban mobility planner to analyze historical traffic situations and estimate the cost, emissions, and noise impacts of proposed measures.
triggering_event: The urban mobility planner initiates the analysis of proposed measures.
preconditions: The urban mobility planner has access to historical traffic data.
The urban mobility planner has defined proposed measures for analysis.
postconditions: The urban mobility planner has estimated the cost of the measure.
The urban mobility planner has estimated the emissions and noise levels associated with the measure.
assumptions: Historical traffic data is available and accurate.
The urban mobility planner has the necessary tools to perform the estimations.
requirements_met: The system shall allow the urban mobility planner to view historical traffic situations.
The system shall allow the urban mobility planner to estimate the cost of a measure.
The system shall allow the urban mobility planner to estimate congestion emissions.
The system shall allow the urban mobility planner to estimate traffic noise levels.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the sources of historical traffic data.
Definition of the parameters for cost, emissions, and noise estimations.
main_flow: 1. urban mobility planner → System displays historical traffic situations.
2. urban mobility planner → System estimates the cost of the proposed measure.
3. urban mobility planner → System estimates the congestion emissions.
4. urban mobility planner → System estimates the traffic noise levels.
